My Resume

Leadership

GT WebDev

As the president of GT WebDev, I create the organization's semester schedule, lead weekly meetings, and manage communication with the College of Computing and the student population. In addition to that, I learn and teach others about web development principles. You can find some of my talks on GT WebDev's Youtube Channel.

Latest Blog Post

Why I still do not have a data plan

Almost every week I get asked the question, "Why don't you have a data plan?". Everyone assumes that the reason is to save money. When I say that I just do not want one, people move forward to the next question, "Why not?". In this post, I hope to clearly show you why I am against having a data plan.
